None.Name: Intoxication
None.Description: Creates a poisonous cloud that envenoms every enemy unit in a 25m radius initially dealing 10 damage every second. But the longer units are exposed to the poison the more damage they will take. The poisonous effect will slowly wear off once they leave the cloud. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

One.Description: Creates a poisonous cloud that envenoms every enemy unit in a 25m radius initially dealing 10 damage every second. But the longer units are exposed to the poison the more damage they will take. The poisonous effect will slowly wear off once they leave the cloud. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

One.Name: Intoxication

But the longer units are exposed to the poison the more damage they will take. The poisonous effect will slowly wear off once they leave the cloud. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

Two.Name: Intoxication
Two.Description: Creates a poisonous cloud that envenoms every enemy unit in a 25m radius initially dealing 10 damage every second. But the longer units are exposed to the poison the more damage they will take. The poisonous effect will slowly wear off once they leave the cloud. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

Three.Name: Intoxication
Three.Description: Creates a poisonous cloud that envenoms every enemy unit in a 25m radius initially dealing 10 damage every second. But the longer units are exposed to the poison the more damage they will take. The poisonous effect will slowly wear off once they leave the cloud. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

Extra.en: The initial damage is 10 at U0. After this,  its damage per second is increased by 10,  and keeps increasing by 10 every 2s the unit remains exposed to the cloud,  up to a maximum of 100 damage every second. At U3,  the initial damage is 13 and it keeps increasing by 13 respectively,  up to a maximum of 130 damage every second. Damage wears off if out of the cloud for 10s,  and does not slowly decay. It just stops after 10s.

It just stops after 10s.
